title: Crawler settings
description: Configure which Exponent pages to crawl and how fast.

startPage.title: Start page (1-203)
startPage.description: The first page number you want the crawler to fetch.

endPage.title: End page (1-203)
endPage.description: The last page number to fetch (inclusive).

useProxy.title: Use Apify proxy?
useProxy.description: If true, requests go through the free shared proxy pool.

maxConcurrency.title: Max parallel pages
maxConcurrency.description: How many pages the crawler downloads at the same time.
